name: European Nursing Research Foundation
goal:
a. To pursue and enhance nursing research as an element of professional excellence to benefit the health of the population in the EU & Europe.

b. To use nursing research to influence EU policies.

c. To promote evidence-based decision-making.
interests: Education, Employment and Social Affairs, Enlargement, Internal Market, Public Health, Regional Policy, Research and Technology
euInitiatives: EU projects (under CIP – ENS4Care; H2020 & Erasmus+ - new upcoming projects); Education (DIR 55/CPD/European Professional Card); Workforce (Recruitment & retention/Migration & mobility); Quality & Safety (Health Systems Research – eHealth/patient empowerment/Community Care/Quality Standards/eSkills)
